channel.title: Matthew Davis
channel.description: A collection of projects, stories and thoughts about technology and politics

item.title: Missing Markets in the Electricity Industry
item.description: My master's thesis about capacity markets, ancillary services and capture price divergence

item.title: Why Colocating solar and batteries does not increase electricity spot market revenue
item.description: How putting the two together does not increase wholesale revenue

item.title: Why solar panels should not be oriented to maximize energy volume
item.description: How tilting further west and more vertically maximizes value

item.title: Don't Forget AEMO's 'Diagonal' Dispatch Targets
item.description: The economic significance of AEMO's requirement to take the entire period to reach the target

item.title: Speeding up APIs and webscraping with request.Session
item.description: One simple trick to make HTTP client code faster and nicer

item.title: The Optimal Electricity Retail Customer Mix
item.description: How choosing a mix of low-risk and high-risk electricity customers is similar to the capital asset pricing model

item.title: Staves
item.description: A Typst package for drawing musical scales

item.title: Google Keep Image Cache Extension
item.description: A Firefox browser extension to speed up Google Keep

item.title: Do you need a blockchain?
item.description: An interactive flowchart to help cut through the hype

item.title: Web analytics are leaking into meatspace
item.description: A Stallman-esque short story about the future of offline tracking

item.title: Why you should think twice before riding a Lime e-bike
item.description: You really should read those terms and conditions

item.title: Achievements of the Coalition Government
item.description: A comprehensive list of (almost) everything the Australian Coalition government did

item.title: Why Paper Voting Is Still Superior
item.description: How digital security is good enough for banking but not for elections

item.title: Machine Learning Unicycling
item.description: Teaching a computer to ride a simulated unicycle

item.title: AWS Step Function Path Tool
item.description: Tool for developing and understanding path manipulations in AWS Step Functions

item.title: Arduino Monitor Rotator
item.description: Build an Automatic Computer Display Rotator With an Arduino

item.title: Python Reddit Bot
item.description: How I wrote a Reddit bot in python to reply to long posts

item.title: 4D graphs
item.description: How to visualize complex-to-complex functions

item.title: How Flag Emojis Get Decided
item.description: Why adding an Indigenous flag is technologically non-trivial

item.title: Lambda Multiprocessing
item.description: A python library I wrote for multiprocessing in AWS Lambda

item.title: Inverter Inertia Emulation
item.description: My bachelor's thesis about emulating inertia with battery inverters

item.title: UT1 TSE Calendar Sync and Filter
item.description: A tool to synchronise personalised Toulouse School of Economics (or UT1) timetables to your calendar app
